    public static final class JMidiComposition.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompositionBuilder<JMidiComposition>
    the class Builds a JMidiComposition according to the default values or the ones directed by the user.

        Adds a new note to the piece.
        Specified by:
        addNote in interface CompositionBuilder<JMidiComposition>
        Parameters:
        start - The start time of the note, in beats.
        end - The end time of the note, in beats.
        instrument - The instrument number (to be interpreted by MIDI).
        pitch - The pitch (in the range [0, 127], where 60 represents C4, the middle-C on a piano).
        volume - The volume (in the range [0, 127]).
